description: UML to ORM is a tool to convert UML representations of databases to a proper  set of classes that you and your ORM can use to manipulate your database. It  also creates SQL code if you wish to.
longdescription: UML to ORM is a tool to convert UML representations of databases to a proper  set of classes that you and your ORM can use to manipulate your database. It  also creates SQL code if you wish to.
